A homoerotic quality or theme ., 同性性欲同性性欲的性质或主题.

entry.tran: （电影、文学、图像等）带有同性恋性爱（或情色）内容的
entry.def: Homoerotic is used to describe things such as films, literature, and images intended to be sexually appealing to homosexual men.
